title: Need more Rp for a champion
body: I need more Rp to buy nocturne, I don't have enough and I can't buy anymore, it also takes to long to get enough ip, can I plz get some help or tips on how to get him

replies.body:
You earn IP by playing games. For the first win you get within a twenty-two hour period will give you a "First win of the day" bonus, netting you around 200 IP for that match. If you focus on getting that bonus, you'll have enough IP in no time!

If you'd like some more information specifically on getting more IP, I suggest you head over to the [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) board.

Hope this helps.
